properties.value: Blighted super restore potions are a variant of super restore potion that can only be drunk while inside the Wilderness. If a Prayer cape or ring of the gods (i) is equipped or a Prayer cape or holy wrench is in the player's inventory, the Prayer restore increases to 8 + 27% of the player's current Prayer level, rounded down. This does not affect the rate of restoration of stats other than Prayer.

Blighted super restore potions are a variant of super restore potion that can only be drunk while inside the Wilderness. If a Prayer cape or ring of the gods (i) is equipped or a Prayer cape or holy wrench is in the player's inventory, the Prayer restore increases to 8 + 27% of the player's current Prayer level, rounded down. This does not affect the rate of restoration of stats other than Prayer.

4 can be purchased at Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing for 1 Last Man Standing point or at the Soul Wars Reward Shop for 10 Zeal Tokens. Unlike other potions, only the 4-dose variant is purchasable on the Grand Exchange.

Contents

  • 1 Maximum restoration
  • 2 Item sources
    • 2.1 Store locations
  • 3 Changes

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
14 May 2020
(update)
  • The price of blighted super restores has been increased from 1,500 to 4,100 points.
  • Half full potions could now be turned into bank placeholders.
30 April 2020
(update)

The price of blighted super restores has been decreased from 9,500 to 1,500 points.

'''Blighted super restore''' potions are a variant of [[super restore]] potion that can only be drunk while inside the [[Wilderness]]. If a [[Prayer cape]] or [[ring of the gods (i)]] is equipped or a Prayer cape or [[holy wrench]] is in the player's inventory, the Prayer restore increases to 8 + 27% of the player's current Prayer level, rounded down. This does not affect the rate of restoration of stats other than Prayer.

4 can be purchased at [[Justine's stuff for the Last Shopper Standing]] for 1 [[Last Man Standing]] point or at the [[Soul Wars Reward Shop]] for 10 [[Zeal Tokens]]. Unlike other potions, only the 4-dose variant is purchasable on the [[Grand Exchange]].
